name: Orbital Crisis
description:
Play Orbital Crisis now !

Orbital Crisis is a revisited Tower Defense taking place around a planet. Build up to 16 different buildings and MegaStructures in order to destroy incoming meteors. Recruits pilots and build spaceships to defend against enemy fleets.

I'm developing this game in my spare time, just for the pleasure of learning. I enjoy any constructive feedback, and anyone looking for participating (graphics, code, promotion, ...) is welcome !
